misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a notable figure hailing from Hirsala Golf, is more than just a participant in the Hector Trophée; he is one of the primary organizers of the event.

With a jovial spirit and a knack for leadership, Toni has become a beloved personality among players and spectators alike. His involvement extends beyond the greens, as he is often seen engaging with fellow golfers, offering words of encouragement and sharing his extensive knowledge of the game.

His contributions to the tournament are immense, marked by his participation in each of the 11 editions of the Hector Trophée. Throughout these years, Toni has secured the coveted Hector Trophée on three occasions, in addition to claiming the individual Victor trophy twice. His consistent performance underscores his commitment to the sport.
As he prepares for his 12th appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, anticipation is high to see what Toni will bring to the course this time.
